text: Shololangakhwo balia bakanibwa okhumoonyana, mana nibakalushila kabakanibwa,	ne	bamoonyana khumakhuwa kobwonooni nende obusuku, nende akokhumukhaya Omurumwa. Ne nibakhwitsila shibakhushesinjia shingala Nyasaye wuwo akhushesinjia tawe, ne baboolanga mumioyo chiabu mbu: “sichila shina, Nyasaye nalakhwelesia eshinyasio khukakhuboolanga kano?” Mana omulilo kwa jahanam kulibayela, balinjilamwo! Ne ako ni amakalushilo amabii kali karie
